General.Name: Serviceware SE
General.Description: Serviceware SE provides a portfolio of software solutions for the digitalization and automation of service processes in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and internationally. The company offers technology business management, such as IT financial and service management; corporate performance management, including planning, budgeting, and forecasting, business intelligence and analytics, and project performance management; and enterprise service management comprising IT and HR service management and healthcare planning. It also provides customer service management, knowledge management, and AI chatbot; and financial, processes, resources, knowledge, and performance serviceware platforms. Further, it offers software licensing, Software as a Service, software maintenance, consulting and implementation, and managed services, as well as IT infrastructure solutions and integrated ESM solutions. Serviceware SE was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Idstein, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Harald  Popp
1.Title: Deputy Chairman of the Admin. Board, CFO & MD
